discourse_list.title: Assign DNS subdomain is.makerdao.network to ISCU

content.content: Intangible Asset Agreed Modification of Management - 2022-11-01  Action Date - 2022-11-08  Asset(s)  DNS control of is.makerdao.network  Asset Type: subdomain Asset Owner: IS-001 Platform Manager: TechOps CU Content Manager: @psychonaut ([email protected]) Purpose: email Last Modification: N/A (SES set the subdomain initially)   Supporters  @Patrick_J @dumitru @Davidutro   Reason for Modification  SES initially set up our DNS to point to a Google Workspace instance managed by Immunefi (not Immunefi Security CU). Immunefi keeps tweaking the security settings and causing things to break. Immunefi Security CU plans to move the DNS to point at their own independent Google Workspace instance so as not to be at the mercy of the zealous Immunefi sysadmins.  CC: @TravinImmunefi

psychonaut:   Immunefi keeps tweaking the security settings and causing things to break. Immunefi Security CU plans to move the DNS to point at their own independent Google Workspace instance so as not to be at the mercy of the zealous Immunefi sysadmins.    To clarify here, these security tweaks are meant to enhance security. However, there are some nuances that causes issues within is.makerdao.network to break (i.e become inaccessible), so there have been some issues every now and then. Though there is good effort from the relevant Immunefi department to remedy the issue, it is best to prevent further issues.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
